transcript: why would you do all this stuff if you're not happy that assumes that my goal in life is to be happy what is your goal in life to do epic  genuinely to be useful why Place do epic over be happy because when I look back on my life in retrospect the things that bring me the most joy in the moment are the things that I was willing to sacrifice for for an extended period of time and those pay memory dividends far greater than the momentary cost that I had at the moment
